title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Average price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Average price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Average price in U.S. dollars about 50.1 was recorded at Year 2008
Min Average price in U.S. dollars about 38.41 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
